data.description:
Another soothing, cinematic background music instrumental by relaxdaily for you to enjoy. This relaxing piano music can be your perfect soundtrack when you like calm and peaceful music while you work, study, do yoga, or meditate. It can also serve you in different applications, like spa music, massage music, inspirational music, etc. Tell me what you feel about this tune and how you use it.

Have a good week, 
Michael (relaxdaily)

maybe one of the following links is good for you:

A simple, but free relaxdaily Android App (stream music): http://goo.gl/uTYh5
Subcribe to my channel (if not already done so): http://goo.gl/603bt
Download your copy of Essence1 at http://relaxdaily.net/essence
visit my channel: http://youtube.com/relaxdaily
Join me on twitter: http://twitter.com/relaxdaily (I don't tweet much...but do it)

...Slow down, use this relaxing background music to improve your mood, enhance your calm, or bring peace to your everyday life. Or maybe you're one of the many people who find relaxing instrumentals of benefit during your workout (yoga, etc.) or playing in the background at work or while your complete household chores. 

... forget about stress and de-stress to this music. Keep balance between work and relaxation. Live your life. Be yourself.

© 2012 relaxdaily.  All rights reserved.

data.description:
Instrumental Music to Relax, Study and Work - Snowy Woods -  relaxdaily N°064

Listen to another piece of relaxdaily music with lots of piano and a soundtrack like arrangement. Last week I ordered a new piano-like master keyboard and some new piano sounds, to get closer to my vision how a soothing piano should sound like. I made use of both with creating this one. 
Hope you like the music,
Michael (relaxdaily)

This track (N°064) became part of the album Essence N°2: https://itunes.apple.com/album/essence-n-2/id740002627

watch the beautiful snowy woods video that I shot only half an hour drive from where I live: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gwQFYrE21fE

© 2013, relaxdaily

visit my website: http://relaxdaily.net
visit my YT channel: http://www.youtube.com/relaxdaily
join me on twitter: http://twitter.com/relaxdaily 
join me on Facebook: http://facebook.com/relaxdaily

data.description:
Another calm, slow and soothing relaxdaily background music instrumental. This smooth and peaceful music arrangement with piano and electric guitar has the power to help you get into a relaxed mood, but also to activate the creative part of your brain. Try it out: Just close your eyes and start dreaming, thinking, reflecting, or even creating. Or, watch the beautiful pictures of Californias coastline in the Big Sur area in a November. Enjoy!

Relaxdaily's background music instrumentals; slow, peaceful, atmospheric music that can be used as a soundtrack for multiple activities. Depending on your interest you might use my music in your relaxation music playlist, as yoga music or as meditation music (I know, this is not the ordinary music for meditation, but it works for many people). You might also use it as music while you're studying, doing homework, working (mentally, creatively), reading, writing, while thinking or reflecting, dreaming, reviewing, making future plans. Some use it as „sleep music" (though there might be better sleep music out there...). Call it chillout, ambient, New Age, instrumental, or background music -- this is not as much about a genre as it is about a feeling. A way of life. With the relaxdaily project, I try to take a little heat from our (generally) too busy lives. I try to deliver a soundtrack for you, when you feel the need for some positive, calming, liberating tunes.

Hope you enjoy my music, 
Michael (relaxdaily)

watch the video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sw6LFQhxu_E
the ultimate relaxdaily playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAE6EB41B485F610A 
subscribe to my channel: http://goo.gl/1KR83
visit my channel: http://goo.gl/1WLRB

© 2012 relaxdaily.  All rights reserved.

data.description:
This slow, peaceful and calming piano music instrumental has all the positive power and emotion to be a working soundtrack while you study or work, relax or calm down, meditate or enjoy your yoga, spa or massage session. When you're into love songs: Don't you think this instrumental has a romantic touch to it? I hope you enjoy this piece of music. Let me know how you feel about it ;)
- Michael (relaxdaily music creator)

visit my website http://relaxdaily.net 
checkout my YouTube channel: http://www.youtube.com/relaxdaily
follow me on http://twitter.com/relaxdaily and http://facebook.com/relaxdaily 

© 2012 relaxdaily

FYI: With this project I try to create music that is different to what you hear on the radio. While I believe that it can make us happy to listen to uptempo, stimulating and entertaining pop music throughout the day,  I also believe that we all can benefit from a slow and  peaceful instrumental from time to time. With this project, I want to create a place where you can come to, when you feel the need to.   

... relaxdaily: music for the mind, body and soul.

data.description:
Enjoy this slow, smooth, soothing instrumental music piece while you relax, read or write, while you are creative, or learn or study, while doing your household chores or in your office while working (at a quite volume ;) 

This track "N°063", became part of my album "Essence N°2": https://itunes.apple.com/album/essence-n-2/id740002627

Hope you enjoy the music, 
Michael (relaxdaily)

About this specific tune: For the first time with the relaxdaily project, I got a bit of musical help with this tune: My brother Jan played the acoustic guitar on this one. It's basically one riff that repeats throughout the track. You can hear it best between 0:02 and 0:14. The rest is pure relaxdaily arrangement :) 

Relaxdaily's background music instrumentals; slow, peaceful, atmospheric music that can be used as a soundtrack for multiple activities. Depending on your interest you might use my music in your relaxation music playlist, as yoga music or as meditation music (I know, this is not the ordinary music for meditation, but it works for many people). You might also use it as music while you're studying, doing homework, working (mentally, creatively), reading, writing, while thinking or reflecting, dreaming, reviewing, making future plans. Some use it as „sleep music" (though there might be better sleep music out there...). Call it chillout, ambient, New Age, instrumental, or background music -- this is not as much about a genre as it is about a feeling. A way of life. With the relaxdaily project, I try to take a little heat from our (generally) too busy lives. I try to deliver a soundtrack for you, when you feel the need for some positive, calming, liberating tunes.

data.description:
Another uplifting relaxdaily background music instrumental. Use this one for your yoga, as study music, as music for video, or put it into a different playlist, that makes sense to you. Do you agree, that my lastest music creation brings both worlds together: it tries to be inspiring, light and uplifting, or positive and motivating WHILE being relaxing, peaceful and calming or soothing. Is that possible at all? 

Comment your opinion about that, or simply comment how this piece of music makes you feel, what you like about it, or how you use it. 

I hope this one enables you to set you in a good mood, perhaps being able to focus on a specific task (try it while doing mental work, while studying or doing homework, or while gaming e.g.)
I hope you enjoy, 
Michael (relaxdaily)

Do you have an Android device? Get my little free app: http://goo.gl/uTYh5
Visit my homepage http://relaxdaily.net

© 2012 relaxdaily.  All rights reserved.

ps: while this relaxing music instrumental is mainly taged as „music for yoga, as music for study and background music for video" it might also work for other activities like chilling on your sofa after a hard day, relaxing, meditation, being creative, planing or reviewing your week, month, year, doing a walk, doing your houshold cores and many more. Or simply play it while you are in a mood for a calm, soothing, peaceful, positive instrumental. 
...Slow down, use this relaxing background music to improve your mood, enhance your calm, or bring peace to your everyday life. Or maybe you're one of the many people who find relaxing instrumentals of benefit during your workout (yoga, etc.) or playing in the background at work or while your complete household chores. 

... forget about stress and de-stress to this music. Keep balance between work and relaxation. Live your life. Be yourself.
